title: Telangana CM meets officials of Hyundai Motor in South Korea to attract investment
description: Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy and IT Minister Sridhar Babu met officials of Hyundai Motor in Seoul to attract investments. Hyundai Motor India Engineering plans to set up a Mega Test Centre in Telangana, featuring automated test tracks and a car manufacturing facility, which is expected to create direct and indirect employment in the region.
